Pre-Game Insights: Rohit Sharma's Team India are preparing to counter the Afghan challenge in the Super 8 opener.
The Indian batters have played the Afghanistan players often in the IPL and might read them well.
Miscellaneous Highlights: India play Afghanistan in their first Super 8 round match.
Others: The Board of Control for Cricket in India (BCCI) posted a video on their social media handle which showcases the Indian team slowly getting into the groove and sweating it out in the training nets before they start their Super 8 round. What grabbed eyeballs was the sight of Rinku Singh rolling his arm over in the Team India nets. The explosive Kolkata Knight Riders batsman is a travelling reserve in the squad and is waiting for his chance to come by in the ongoing World Cup.
